XIAZHI is a cloud computing software company headquartered in China. It assists customers in creating new business models, operating models and technical models in the digital age. Through professional and unique consulting services, we are committed to helping customers achieve large-scale digitalization, meet complex challenges, accelerate scale transformation, and quickly utilize the huge business opportunities brought by the latest technology.
